#labels Featured,Installation
= Installation =

Robotframework Eclipse Library from v0.7 now works on :
 * robotframework v2.5.3
 * python v2.6
 * jython v2.5.1
 * RIDE v0.27
 * Eclipse 3.5 (should work also on 3.4 but not tested!)
 * SWTBot 2.0
 * Javalib core 0.8.1 with dependencies

== Eclipse Plugin ==
 Before using Eclipse Library, you should install a plugin under Eclipse.
 * Robotframework Eclipse Library plugin for SWTBot update site
   [http://scrumvision.sourceforge.net/update-site/eclipselibrary]
 This plugin will ask you installing SWTBot normaly.
 * if not, SWTBot plugins should be installed from [http://download.eclipse.org/technology/swtbot/galileo/dev-build/update-site SWTBot  update site]

 
== Eclipse library ==
 Download the latest eclipse library jar file.
 * The jar with all dependencies [http://code.google.com/p/robotframework- eclipselibrary/downloads/list eclipselibrary-x.x-with-dependencies.jar]
OR
 * The EclipseLibrary [http://code.google.com/p/robotframework-eclipselibrary/downloads/list eclipselibrary-x.x.jar]
 * The JavalibCore  [http://code.google.com/p/robotframework-javatools/wiki/JavalibCore javalib-core-x.x.x-jar-with-dependencies.jar]
 * The Eclipse Equinox launcher (like org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.201.R35x_v20090715.jar) that you should find under eclipse installation folder, under plugins
Place files in 'lib' folder under your test suite

 Download the run.py python robotframework script for Eclipse tests
 * [http://code.google.com/p/robotframework-eclipselibrary/downloads/list run.py]

 Add Eclipse Library resource file in your test case as a resource.
 * [http://robotframework-eclipselibrary.googlecode.com/files/EclipseLibraryKeywords.html  EclipseLibraryKeywords.html]

 Add Eclipse Library xml keyword specification file under PYTHON_PATH for keyword completion under RIDE
 * [http://robotframework-eclipselibrary.googlecode.com/files/EclipseLibrary.xml  EclipseLibrary.xml]

== Some test cases == 
Those test cases are used for unit testing of the library.
You could use it as per samples.
 * [http://robotframework-eclipselibrary.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/org.lcx.robotframework.eclipselibrary-testcases/]
